forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 55F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening then thundershowers overnight. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain. High 54F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain early...then becoming partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain diminishing to a few showers late. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 44F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
